entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add `bool TryGetElementAt<T>(this IEnumerable<T>, out T element)` #110338
  • [wasi] wasi-socket sample fails with single file bundle #110337
  • Intermittent System.IO Errors During Build, Rebuild, and Clean Operations #110328
  • windows/x64: Assertion failed 'unreached' during 'Physical promotion' #110326
  • Reconsider deleting `linux-instructions.md` and related files #110324
    10.0.0
  • HttpClient contention due to shared CTS registrations #110323
    Future
  • ApplyCompressionNegotiation build task fails when RCL references a Nuget RCL with StaticWebAssetBasePath set to / #110321
  • IsolatedStorageFile Throws System.UriFormatException #110319
  • [.NET 10] missing Mono and Emscripten manifests for downlevel .NET 9 targeting #110318
  • [Fuzzlyn] JIT: Assertion failed 'IsMultiRegNode()' during 'Head and tail merge' #110316
    10.0.0
  • JIT: IV opts relop evaluation misses combining facts to prove relops #110315
    10.0.0
  • Calling IMetaDataEmit::GetSaveSize invalidates GenericParam and other tokens #110311
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'newLclValue.BothDefined()' during 'Do value numbering' #110306
    10.0.0
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Propagate StringSyntaxAttribute #110305
  • [API Proposal]: Path.ContainsInvalidPathChar and Path.ContainsInvalidFileNameChar #110301
  • Expand ILLink/ILC support for 'eliminate dead branches around typeof comparisons' to work on internal types too #110300
  • Test failure: Interop/StructMarshalling/ReversePInvoke/MarshalSeqStruct/ReversePInvoke/ReversePInvokeTest/ReversePInvokeTest.cmd #110299
  • Test failure: baseservices/compilerservices/RuntimeHelpers/RuntimeHelpersTests/RuntimeHelpersTests.cmd #110298

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Hope to add this method Pow(BigInteger a, BigInteger b, BigInteger c) #110310
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Inconsistent profile data"' during 'Remove empty try' #110317
    10.0.0
  • Incorrect Parameter Order in ArgumentException Constructor in IfNullOrWhitespace Method #110294
  • System.TypeInitializationException in ActivityListener when accessing ActivitySource from a static field #110249
  • JIT.HardwareIntrinsics failing on native AOT #110240
  • Question : dotnet counters ThreadPool Thread Count and ThreadPool.SetMinThread #110304
  • [API Proposal]: Allow opt-out of automatic disposal in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #109492
  • Test failure: readytorun/tests/mainv1/mainv1.cmd #109500
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/regressions/V1/SEH/VJ/RecursiveException/RecursiveException.cmd #109498
    10.0.0
  • JIT does not elide empty try/catch blocks #107191
    Future
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.EnvironmentVariables.Test.EnvironmentVariablesTest.BindingDoesNotThrowIfReloadedDuringBinding #109904
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Tests.HostTests.CreateDefaultBuilder_DoesNotChangeContentRootIfCurrentDirectoryIsWindowsSystemDirectory #109692
  • Test failure: System.Data.Tests.DataSetTest2.ReadXmlSchema_Nested #110132
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorParserTests.MultipleTypeDefinitions #110180
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Tests.Integration.DelayLoadingTests.PartTypeLoadedLazilyLazyLoopLoadsLazily #110130
    10.0.0
  • Test Failure: JIT/jit64/opt/cg/cgstress/CgStress1_ro/CgStress1_ro.cmd #110176
    10.0.0
  • WASM build failed to download geckodriver due to network blip #106407
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-staging] Suppress IL3050 warnings in ILLink tests #110340
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #110336
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110334
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add vector support to System.Numerics.Tensors.TensorPrimitives.LeadingZeroCount for Byte and Int16 #110333
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • Fix Workflow Broken Markdown Links #110332
    documentation, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix analyzer tracking of nullable enums #110331
    Servicing-consider, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update tests to see if NativeAOT failure is related to other PR #110330
    NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework
  • [cdac] Handle type descs in `RuntimeTypeSystem_1.GetLoaderModule` #110325
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Implement GCCover portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #110322
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Allow AltJit for matched VM to also use otherwise unsupported ISAs #110320
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • docs: Update ilc-architecture DependencyGraphViewer link #110314
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid mask<->vector optimization for masks used in unhandled ways #110307
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Check loaded in dac values to avoid SIGSEGV on null pointers #110303
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #110335
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • JIT: Update profile data for continuation block of removed call-finally #110327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Pin the 6.0.x down-level versions to 6.0.36 #110329
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #109920
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Delete shared ThrowHelper used only a single test #110313
    needs-area-label
  • Rename {CLR,DOTNET}_ICU/OPENSSL_VERSION_OVERRIDE #110259
    area-System.Globalization, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #109742
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #109566
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Disable GFNI tests for NAOT #110250
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable removal of try/catch if the try can't throw. #110273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/9.0-staging] Update Azure Linux tag names #110341
    needs-area-label
  • Fix Configuration to throw with ErrorOnUnknownConfiguration option #110209
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 10.0.0
  • New GC decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: enable cloning of try regions #110020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #110058
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • [release/9.0] Fix length check for Convert.TryToHexString{Lower} #110228
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 9.0.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2593673 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cDAC] Implement ReJIT portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #109936
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [release/9.0-staging] Ensure Vector.Create is properly recognized as intrinsic #109322
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for emitting Source Link data #110270
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • The mask of shift amount in `IShiftOperators<byte, int, byte>` should be 7 #103900
    area-System.Numerics, breaking-change, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Avoid an allocation in BigInteger.Parse("-2147483648") #104666
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110211
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Enable more ILLink test cases with native AOT #110166
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Check if lock is orphaned in GetThreadOwningMonitorLock #107168
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [8.0] Guard against empty Accept address #108334
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • use collection syntax in illink #108458
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix comments in AggregateException.GetBaseException() #107743
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #110059
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.12
  • Unwrap NullableValue for diagnostics creation and add try/catch for formatting diagnostics #110229
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Provide more info on the failing CustomAttributeProvider #110230
    test-enhancement, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Update to .NET 10 build images #110198
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add pMethod param to getHelperFtn EE-JIT API #110267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    arch-arm32, arch-x86, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use static project from assets or `dotnet new`, unification of browser tests #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [RuntimeAsync] Make Async marker a bit in MethodImpl flags #110274
    area-Meta
  • JIT_CountProfile: Avoid BSR instruction for low counts #110258
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unify two identical implementations of class_kind in SGen GC bridges #107909
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Allow strength reducing to GCD of IVs #110222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono][aot] Fix compilation crashes when type load exception is generated in code #110271
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][sgen] Add separate card mark function to be used with debug #110269
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono][sgen] Add separate card mark function to be used with debug #110268
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-mono
  • JIT: Track GC info accurately into epilogs in codegen #107283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Do greedy 4-opt for backward jumps in 3-opt layout #110277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Always aggressively compact blocks #109521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Avoid exception when parsing AD path for port number #110224
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DirectoryServices, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix System.Reflection.Emit `SetChecksum` creating invalid pdb #110205
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 9.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [RuntimeAsync] Double check OSR in async2 struct instance methods #2814

PullRequests

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] Add Type Database documentation #2820
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [Swift bindings] Add Swift code generation doc #2816
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [SwiftBindings] Describe protocol constraints #2811
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [RuntimeAsync] Switch the implementation to the new shape of runtime async methods. #2818
  • [SwiftBindings] Added support for size, stride, alignment, and the value witness table #2813
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Satellite assemblies do not pass PathMap to Csc task #45256
  • Investigate usage of the different CommandResolvers #45251
  • Visual Studio Installer removes 8.0 SDK #45241
  • dotnet tool CLI command fails when nuget.config includes a private package source #45235

PullRequests

Created

  • Pass missing compiler parameters #45257
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #45252
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update image to centos-stream9 #45250
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [LoongArch64]: Add loongarch64 R2R resolve #45236
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun

Merged

  • Enable debug logging from middleware in --verbose mode #45254
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Use WebAssemblyHotReloadCapabilities project property #45055
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Split GivenThatWeWantToRunILLink test class into multiple so Helix can run them separately #45056
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Merge toolset-tasks and core-sdk-tasks and put in common location #45242
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support publishing of multi-architecture OCI container images #43085
    Servicing-approved, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Pass the `--ci` argument to `darc` in SDK's CI #45248
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #45123
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move VSMSBuildExtensions & VSTemplateLocator under src #45244
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable VMR updates for `dotnet/scenario-tests` #45005
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VMR: move DevVersions jobs to a separate stage #45226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add projects, .config, and .nuspec to .editorconfig #45225
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable tests following the net10 transition #44931
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Wait on task loop in case of exception #45237
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-DotNet Test

Updated

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, Area-Templates
  • Prevent copy/paste of password and warn #44761
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Signing in Repos that Override Build Actions #44855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • format: stop checking for dotnet cli version #44958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run all steps in a container #44969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [dotnet-watch] Improve failure reporting in tests #44879
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.SolutionPersistence: 1.0.23 -> 1.0.26 #45199
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Wait for project changes when unchanged project doesn't build #45167
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add .json to editorconfig #45227
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [.NET 10] certain `[Obsolete]` warnings are not reported #76226
    17.13
  • System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp #76225
  • IDE0320 not enabled when dotnet_analyzer_diagnostic.severity = error #76222
    17.13
  • Area - Add Accessibility Modifiers #76217

Closed

  • [Bug]: Code action `Simplify conditional expression` leads to incorrect formatting #71418
    Backlog
  • Type inferer doesn't work for argument of base record primary constructor #70803
    17.13
  • Suggestion to remove cast to Delegate results in warning #68307
    Backlog
  • IDE0270 triggers over a #if #70514
    Backlog
  • Name suggestion doesn't work with some generic types #63943
    Backlog
  • Extract local function puts function in disabled section #63917
    Backlog
  • FAR misclassifies target-typed constructor call sites #60949
    Backlog
  • Generate field/property not working in top-level statement. #58491
    Backlog
  • Use implicit/explicit type doesn't work with lambda function types #58404
    Backlog
  • Extract Local should infer from object initializer properties #21602
    Backlog
  • Implement Interface adds uneeded members when implementing interface with new methods #19721
    Backlog
  • C# goto label indentation setting not working correctly #63601
    Backlog
  • With "Place goto labels one indent less than current", indentation isn't adjusted on ":" #13981
    Backlog
  • Find all reference should bring me to xaml instead of the generated code #52843
    Backlog
  • Convert to Raw String changes significant line endings #70209
    Backlog
  • Double click to select string results in selection outside of string #58774
    Backlog
  • 'Introduce using statement' on method call expression statements returning IDisposable #37260
    Backlog
  • Enumerators incorrectly allow continued enumerator after disposal #76078
    17.13
  • Add fixer when for `params` span overloads are used with Expression selected #74030
    17.13
  • Method call completion for "new" expression when the created object's type is already known. #54213
    Backlog
  • Generate type should take into account the initializer to initialize fields/props as well. #58495
    Backlog
  • Interface type is not offered in completion list while typing declaration of an explicit implementation for a static member #54005
    Backlog
  • Support rewriting `string.Remove` in IDE0057 "Use range operator" #76091
    Backlog
  • Tuple item "field" is not properly named in property accessor #76210
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.UnitTests.LinkedFileDiffMerging.LinkedFileDiffMergingTests.TestChangeSignature failed #18432
    18.0
  • Hot Reload unusable with CS8055 if a file created via "Move type to X.cs" is not touched by the user #72984
    Backlog
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63888
  • Integration test process crashes #63773
  • FindAllReferences should handle `Dispose` referenced in `using` and `foreach` statements #28228
    Backlog
  • Fake positive CS8619 when using Linq #76180
  • Area - Event Hookup #76215

PullRequests

Created

  • Threading fixes #76230
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not treat Task.Run methods as 'apparent' for 'use var' #76229
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • fix flaky lsp diagnostic test #76228
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix override implementation with generics and constraints #76223
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update find-refs to find references to Dispose in a using-statement #76221
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update FAR and Go to Def to work on indexers #76220
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support introduce variable at the top level #76218
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Fix wrapping issues in simplify conditional #76175
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add more tests for https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/76083 #76164
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update type inference in a primary constructor base type #76174
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix issue with explicit interface completion and static interface members #76150
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Keep cast that prevents the compiler from warning about an unintentional implicit object cast. #76172
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Disable 'use coalesce expression' when statements cross a PP boundary #76173
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support name completion on generic types #76170
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Improve extract-local-function in the presence of pp directives #76169
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update xunit #76196
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix info for implicit objects in find-references #76167
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix issue trying to generate fields/properties from a top level program #76161
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support implicit/explicit var with inferred lambda types #76160
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add a dedicated fixer to fixup code in expression trees that is now calling restricted apis #76124
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Clamp selections within a string literal so they do not go outside of it #76163
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Set state of enumerator object to "after" during disposal #76090
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update 'introduce using' to support expression statements #76147
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Insert parens when hitting semicolon after 'new' #76152
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix PowerShell Script Issues #76219
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Use implicit initializer if present to generate type properties #76162
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update the patterns that 'use range operator' supports. #76129
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #76227
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Infer better variable name when initializing from an anonymous type #76145
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • When converting to raw strings, do not change \r\n sequences if not explicitly requested by the user #76120
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • REmove methods no longer in use #76148
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove Navigate_asynchronously_exerimental option #76128
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Do a better job matching properties to implement against existing properties #76144
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Format labeled statements when colon is typed #76142
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Enable skipped test #76143
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix null encoding in new document in move type action #74623
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Make `SymbolAnnotation` static #65829
    Area-IDE, Community, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Catch expected exception when reading info out of a PDB #76182
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Disable 'use pattern matching' when eliding multiple calls that pass by ref #76183
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not pass primary constructor parameters explicit when extracting methods #76179
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support modifiers with simple lambda parameters. #75400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add initial runtime async spike #76121
    Area-Compilers, Needs API Review
  • Update Razor DynamicFile Provider #76050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support implementing protected members in implement interface #76178
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • avoid ITextSnapshotLine.GetText() #76133
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Enable CA1052 (static holder types should be static) #65830
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, VSCode
  • Improve parsing recovery with 'file' keyword #76185
    Area-Compilers, Feature - File-Local Types
  • Revert "Reduce File I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder (#724… #75761
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • VBOverloadResolutionPriority: clone remaining C# tests for the feature #76127
    Area-Compilers
  • Optimise allocations in `AssertEx.NormalizeWhitespace` and `OperationTreeVerifier.Verify` #75202
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature flag #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Use new championed proposal and test plan for "extensions" feature #76131
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - Extension Everything
  • Move off of specialized task methods #76149
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Don't place 'async' after 'partial' modifier #76168
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Close stale PRs #75963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix switch indentation for list patterns #75953
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Don't generate nullable attributes when implementing interfaces/abstract classes #38203
    Area-IDE, Need More Info, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • API Version Neutral Throwing 404 - DotNet 8.0 Upgrade #59273
  • Perf regression: fortunes #59272
  • MultipartReaderStream ignores offset using Read #59269
  • Handle Leak of CancellationTokenSource in RemoteJSRuntime class #59263
    Backlog
  • Handle Leak of ReadableJsonConfigurationProvider in FromStdInStrategy class #59260
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi. How can I detect when dotnet watch has hot reloaded? #59258
  • Perf improvement: json #59255

Closed

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #59256
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-noop #59241
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100] DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints on build throws FileNotFoundException: "Could not find file 'wwwroot\arrivalsÞpartures.jpg'" ( % character in file name ) #59246
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #59247

PullRequests

Created

  • [Infrastructure] Update Selenium versions #59268
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [LoongArch64]: Enable the crossgen2 tool to optimize aspnetcore runtime #59131
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add option to exception handler middleware to not log error #59074
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix race condition in RedisCache when setting key expiration #59212
    bug, community-contribution, feature-caching, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Add SaveAllModules command #3138
    Future

Updated

  • Unhandled exception. System.IO.EndOfStreamException: Unable to read beyond the end of the stream. #5061
    10.0.0
  • Migrate off of Debian 11 #5064
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update release/stable from main #5074
  • Add DiagnosticsClientConnector to support creating a DiagnosticsClient from a diagnostic port #5073

Merged

  • Implement SaveAllModules #5069

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bugs in Absolute Layout with .NET 9 #26317
  • WKWebView Handler crash do_icall interp.c, line 2286 SIGTRAP #26314
  • The .NET 9 Maui app unable to read .json file #26310
  • Build tasks are not localized #26308
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [testing] Appium failing to install #26305
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Shell.Current.FlyoutBehavior is not taking account in a mixed Flyout Behavior scenario #26302
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • iOS/Catalyst build performance regression from net8.0 to net9.0 #26300

Closed

  • BindingFailure issue although DataType is set correctly #26288
  • .Net9 MAUI template does not work on Samsung Galaxy device #26293
  • .net 9 maui Shell.Current.GotoAsync("..") app crash with debugger is attached exception on windows when back from a page that implements map control #26289
  • Intermittent System.IO Errors During Build, Rebuild, and Clean Operations #26316
  • [9.0.100] NETSDK1083: RuntimeIdentifier 'win10-x86' is not recognized in .NET 9.0 for .NET 8 Target Framework with Evergine 2024.6.28.781 #26052
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Unable to launch app after it's uploaded #26294
  • Significant drop in supported Android devices after updating app to .NET 9 #26301
  • Fix disabled WebView Cookie Tests #24913
    Backlog
  • Unable to deploy to latest IOS device #24271
  • MAUI source generator interferes with other projects #26125
  • Thank You to Our Outstanding Contributors: @MartyIX and @albyrock87 #24650
  • Registry key does not show on registry editor but read/write works on Windows #26299
  • Regression from MAUI 8: Picker entries blank in release mode (Android) #25935
  • Unable to custom the MAUI Android Talkback configuration in the keyboard #26002
  • MAUI Grouped ListView Remove Item Causes Error when more than one Group item exists #26015
  • Incompatible ButtonHandler when embedding MAUI page in .NET Android-project #7549
  • iOS Application crashes on startup when built through Azure pipeline #18652
  • Oppo's system overrides the app's font and in place uses the system set font. #15654
  • Image loading error #21670
  • Custom Fonts Don't Show On A Real Device #19935
  • The color of hamburger icon in FlyoutPage always be changed to the white in Maui. #23087
  • Unable to set alternate app(Dynamic Icon Changes) icons in maui Android!! #22703

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Fix deselect item on CollectionView #26315
    area-controls-collectionview, .NET 9 SR2
  • [main] Rebase of 26174 - Localization Updates #26309
    area-templates, area-localization, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add GraphicsView UiTestCategory #26307
    area-drawing, area-testing
  • Update Appium version to 2.12.2 #26306
    area-infrastructure, testing-infrastructure
  • [iOS] GraphicsView DrawString - fix #26304
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [XC] import types in StaticResourceExtension #26303
    .NET 9 SR2

Merged

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 5 #25772
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 11 #25855
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 18 #26097
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix disabled WebView Cookie Tests #24978
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • Migrate xml docs directly into code for ExtensionPoints #24333
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Revert "Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading" #26212
    do-not-merge, i/regression, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix issue with template processing #26196
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] [Mac] Fix for Gradient background size is incorrect when invalidating parent #26222
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Add options for specifying a minimum workload version requirement #25993
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Added DidPopItem to the navigation renderer #26235
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix for TabbedPage - ScrollView not allowing scrolling when it should #26217
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 17 #26081
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 23 #26219
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 16 #26029
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix navigation stuck on iOS when pushing on hidden tab section in TabBar #22574
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Navigation from the 'more' tab #26292
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed HeaderFooterGrid to pass on CV1 and CV2 #26022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Database.Command: Taking time to execute the queries because of new DateOnly datatype in .NET 8 #35248

Closed

  • Regression when using ImmutableArray's Contains, while Array's Contains method still works. #35102
    9.0.1
  • Error in Generated Migration Script for dotnet-ef 8.0.11 #35132
    9.0.x
  • Scaffolding: Optionally including the `nullable` directive for generated code #33426
  • SQLite Error 19: 'FOREIGN KEY constraint failed'. exception is thrown in case of foreign key constraint is configured in base class's EntityTypeConfiguration #34761

PullRequests

Created

  • Change ExecuteUpdate to accept non-expression lambda #35257
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35256
  • Don't attempt to remove a detached entry from the local view #35253
  • Don't escape separator characters in single key values #35252

Merged

  • Merge branch 'release/9.0-staging' into release/9.0 #35255
  • [release/9.0] Fix Contains on ImmutableArray #35251
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0] Add more specific messages when pending model changes are detected #35221
    Servicing-approved
  • Fix test on newest SQL Server (not run on CI ATM) #35254
  • [release/9.0] Fix query filters with context accessors #35246
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0] Set environment variables to "Development" when creating DbContext using IDesignTimeDbContextFactory #35230
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0] Prevent owner entity from becoming optional #35222
    Servicing-approved
  • Uniquify all variables used in SQL Server migration scripts #35177
  • Fix Contains on ImmutableArray #35247
  • [release/9.0] Avoid using `^` and `~` when invalid because of value converters #35241
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0] Uniquify all variables used in SQL Server migration scripts #35228
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • Add SqlServer translation for DateOnly.ToDateTime(timeOnly) #35194
